verbose_text: Furthermore, TGF-beta1 was firstly identified as an inducer of EMT in normal mammary epithelial cells and has since been shown to mediate EMT in a number of different epithelial cells, including renal proximal tubular and lens cells.
evidence: TGF-beta1 was firstly identified as an inducer of EMT in normal mammary epithelial cells and has since been shown to mediate EMT
